page.title: 04 FIGURE OF EIGHT POND
page.content:
This pond is in the shape of a number eight. It is about twenty metres long and twelve wide .
It is used for fishing by the people who live nearby. The fish that can be caught there are carp, tench, bream, perch , roach and rudd.
The fishermen said that the deepest part was three metres deep, but most of it is two metres deep.
There were seven people fishing when we went on a Wednesday afternoon in June.
The pond is in very low lying land.It is between Squibb's Factory and Fender Valley Farm.
